summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 FORD EDGE. WHILE DRIVING 65 MPH, THE VEHICLE LOST ACCELERATION. THE CONTACT PULLED OVER AND RESTARTED THE VEHICLE, AND THE "SEE MANUAL" MESSAGE APPEARED. THE FAILURE OCCURRED INTERMITTENTLY. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 57,000.
